name: Review changed information (App 2)
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

Your ((partner)) has updated the information in your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)). You need to review the information by ((date of response)) 

Sign in and review the updated information they have provided: ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Action required: review your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
